title: President Trump’s Energy Independence Policy – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
March 28, 2017
I am going to lift the restrictions on American energy, and allow this wealth to pour into our communities.
						Donald J. Trump					MUCH NEEDED REFORM: The past Administration burdened Americans with costly regulations that harmed American jobs and energy production.AMERICAN ENERGY INDEPENDENCE: President Donald J. Trump’s Energy Independence Policy Executive Order reverses the regulations on American jobs and energy production.FREEING AMERICA’S POTENTIAL: President Trump has worked tirelessly to free American industry and ingenuity from the constraints of Government overreach.FULFILLING HIS PROMISE: By taking action on the Clean Power Plan, President Trump is fulfilling his promise to the American people.
